title: Audio Corridor VR fixes
summary: Improved VR camera rig, autopilot in XR, locomotion, and reliable explosions/starting positions.

title: Audio Corridor WebXR
summary: Added Quest-ready WebXR mode with controller firing, touch controls, and a VR lab card for Audio Corridor.

title: Drone Seeker cockpit combat
summary: New Drone Seeker WebXR build with cockpit HUDs, wave-based enemy drones, procedural engine/laser audio, and calibrator-exported offsets.

title: VR lab additions
summary: Added Squashed Balls physics playground and Fountains pyrotechnics lab cards to the WebXR/PCVR hub.

title: Space Inflators PCVR
summary: New Space Inflators arcade shooter added to the PCVR lab with voxel invaders, shields, and boss assaults.

title: Curling VR WebXR
summary: Added Curling VR sports sim to the PCVR lab with AI ends, grip-to-throw stones, and tweakable ice friction/curl.
